scripts.create-database: mysql -uroot -proot -e 'CREATE DATABASE geo_explorer_v2; ALTER DATABASE geo_explorer_v2 CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;'
scripts.recreate-database: npm run drop-database; npm run create-database;
scripts.mainnet-create: mysql -uroot -proot -e 'CREATE DATABASE geo_explorer_mainnet; ALTER DATABASE geo_explorer_mainnet CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;'
scripts.mainnet-recreate: npm run mainnet-drop && npm run mainnet-create
scripts.poa-create: mysql -uroot -proot -e 'CREATE DATABASE geo_explorer_poa; ALTER DATABASE geo_explorer_poa CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;'
scripts.poa-recreate: npm run poa-drop && npm run poa-create
scripts.xdai-create: mysql -uroot -proot -e 'CREATE DATABASE geo_explorer_xdai; ALTER DATABASE geo_explorer_xdai CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;'
scripts.xdai-recreate: npm run xdai-drop && npm run xdai-create
scripts.kovan-create: mysql -uroot -proot -e 'CREATE DATABASE geo_explorer_kovan; ALTER DATABASE geo_explorer_kovan CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;'
scripts.kovan-recreate: npm run kovan-drop && npm run kovan-create
scripts.sokol-create: mysql -uroot -proot -e 'CREATE DATABASE geo_explorer_sokol; ALTER DATABASE geo_explorer_sokol CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;'
scripts.sokol-recreate: npm run sokol-drop && npm run sokol-create
